mapper.select: SELECT balanceNo, plusMinus, regDate, storeCode, description, itemCode FROM balance
SELECT balanceNo, plusMinus, regDate, storeCode, description, itemCode FROM balance where regDate >= date(#{startdaystr}) and regDate < date(#{enddaystr}) + interval 1 day

SELECT ba.balanceNo, ba.plusMinus, ba.regDate, ba.storeCode, ba.description, ba.itemCode, ac.itemname FROM balance ba, accountcode ac where regDate >= date(#{startdaystr}) and regDate < date(#{enddaystr}) + interval 1 day and ba.itemCode = ac.itemCode and ba.storeCode = #{storeCode}

SELECT ba.balanceNo, ba.plusMinus, ba.regDate, ba.storeCode, ba.description, ba.itemCode ,ac.itemname FROM balance ba ,accountcode ac where regDate >= date(#{startdaystr}) and regDate < date(#{enddaystr}) + interval 1 day and ba.itemCode = ac.itemCode and plusMinus >= 0

SELECT ba.balanceNo, ba.plusMinus, ba.regDate, ba.storeCode, ba.description, ba.itemCode ,ac.itemname FROM balance ba ,accountcode ac where regDate >= date(#{startdaystr}) and regDate < date(#{enddaystr}) + interval 1 day and ba.itemCode = ac.itemCode and plusMinus < 0

select me.foodCode as foodCode, me.foodName as foodName, sum(odt.quantity) as totalcount, odt.price as orderDetailPrice , sum((odt.price *(1-(od.discountRate/100))) *odt.quantity) as totalprice from orders od, orderdetail odt, menu me where od.orderNo = odt.orderNo and odt.foodCode = me.foodCode and DATE_FORMAT(od.orderDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{todayDate} and od.storeCode = #{storeCode} group by me.foodCode order by me.foodCode asc

select me.foodCode as foodCode, me.foodName as foodName, sum(odt.quantity) as totalcount, odt.price as orderDetailPrice , sum((odt.price *(1-(od.discountRate/100))) *odt.quantity) as totalprice from orders od, orderdetail odt, menu me where od.orderNo = odt.orderNo and odt.foodCode = me.foodCode and od.orderDate >= date(#{startday}) and od.orderDate < date(#{endday}) + interval 1 day and od.storeCode = #{storeCode} group by me.foodCode order by me.foodCode asc

select me.foodCode as foodCode, me.foodName as foodName, sum(odt.quantity) as totalcount, odt.price as orderDetailPrice , sum((odt.price *(1-(od.discountRate/100))) *odt.quantity) as totalprice from orders od, orderdetail odt, menu me where od.orderNo = odt.orderNo and odt.foodCode = me.foodCode and od.orderDate >= date(#{startDay}) and od.orderDate < date(#{endDay}) + interval 1 day and od.storeCode = #{storeCode} and od.customerNo = #{customerNo} group by me.foodCode order by me.foodCode asc
select date_format(min(orderdate),'%Y-%m-%d') from orders od, orderdetail odt, menu me where od.orderNo = odt.orderNo and odt.foodCode = me.foodCode and od.customerNo = #{id}
